name: Ojas blend
address: 1531 Johnston Rd, White Rock, BC V4B 3Z6, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Funky Chicken Bowl
hasMenuItem.description: Charred Chicken,, Pickled Cabbage, Pickled Onion, Cucumber, Pomegranate (seasonal), Cilantro, Pepper, FUNKY SAUCE , Jalapeños, Fried Onion, Long grain rice and Spring mix.

hasMenuItem.name: Regular Bowl
hasMenuItem.description: Customizable bowl starting with a choice of long grain rice, cauli & quinoa blend, or spring mix. Protein options include charred chicken tikka, shrimp ceviche, tofu curls, curried egg, masala chickpea, paneer, lamb skewer, salmon, or tuna. Select from 11 sauce options like hummus, white sauce, smoked truffle yoghurt, or butter chicken sauce for the first layer and similarly for the second. Finished with a choice of rice crackers, potato chippers, or crispy root vegetable crisp.

hasMenuItem.name: Cauli-Sutra
hasMenuItem.description: Chickpea, Cauliflower, Squash, Smoked truffle yogurt, Radish, Mint, Wild Rice, Spinach, Goat cheese, Beetroot, Hemp's hearts.

hasMenuItem.name: Why Not, Poke?
hasMenuItem.description: Mix greens, Carrot, Cucumber, Tuna, Goat cheese (cranberry), Fried garlic, Tahini dressing, Radish, Sesame seeds, Avocado, Crispy Root vegetables crisp., Crispy seaweed .

hasMenuItem.name: Butter chicken
hasMenuItem.description: All time favourite, perfect housemade butter saucemade with organic tomatoes and coconut sugar, long grain basmati rice, charred chicken tikka , pickle onion and mint coulis.

hasMenuItem.name: Large Bowl
hasMenuItem.description: Customizable large bowl featuring a choice of bases like long grain rice or cauli & quinoa. Select from diverse proteins including charred chicken tikka, shrimp ceviche, and tofu curls. Complement with dual sauce options ranging from hummus to curry sauce. Finalize with crunchies like potato chippers or vegan crispy root vegetable crisp. Add extra sauces and crunchies for a personalized touch.

hasMenuItem.name: Charred Chicken
hasMenuItem.description: Charred chicken, marinated in traditional spices, then fried to achieve a crispy exterior while maintaining a tender interior.

hasMenuItem.name: Shrimp Ceviche
hasMenuItem.description: Shrimp ceviche typically consists of marinated shrimp mixed with onions, tomatoes, and cilantro, accented with Indian spices and lime juice.

hasMenuItem.name: Garlic Naan
hasMenuItem.description: Organic Flour in House  Made  Naan  , garlic butter rubbed on it .

hasMenuItem.name: Avocado
hasMenuItem.description: Fresh and creamy fruit with a rich taste, perfect for adding a touch of luxury to any dish.

hasMenuItem.name: Extra Veggies
hasMenuItem.description: A medley of vegetables, typically including carrots, cauliflower, broccoli, and peas, sautéed with Indian spices.

hasMenuItem.name: Hummus
hasMenuItem.description: Creamy Chickpea Dip with Olive Oil and Warm Spices

hasMenuItem.name: Pulled Lamb
hasMenuItem.description: Slow-cooked lamb, typically shredded and infused with a blend of aromatic spices.

hasMenuItem.name: Tofu Curls
hasMenuItem.description: Tofu curls typically include thinly sliced tofu, marinated and prepared with a blend of Indian spices, then fried or baked to achieve a crispy texture.

hasMenuItem.name: Ahi Tuna
hasMenuItem.description: Seared ahi tuna, typically includes Indian spices and herbs, served as a flavorful addition to the sides menu.

hasMenuItem.description: Cured wild salmon, typically includes a blend of spices and herbs, following traditional Indian gravlax methods.

hasMenuItem.name: Curried Egg
hasMenuItem.description: Boiled eggs simmered in a traditional curry sauce with onions, tomatoes, and a blend of aromatic spices.

hasMenuItem.name: Masala Chickpea
hasMenuItem.description: Chickpeas cooked with a blend of traditional Indian spices, tomatoes, and onions, creating a savory side dish.

hasMenuItem.name: Rice
hasMenuItem.description: Flavorful rice dish prepared to perfection, showcasing an ideal complement for any meal.

hasMenuItem.name: Smoke Truffle Dressing
hasMenuItem.description: A unique dressing infused with the essence of smoke and the luxurious flavor of truffle, typically accompanying salads.

hasMenuItem.name: Dressing
hasMenuItem.description: A blend of traditional spices and herbs typically used to enhance the flavors of salads and sides.

hasMenuItem.name: Crackers
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy Indian-style crackers, typically includes a blend of spices for added flavor.

hasMenuItem.name: Cauli Quinoa
hasMenuItem.description: Quinoa mixed with cauliflower, seasoned with Indian spices, offering a nutritious twist on traditional grains.

hasMenuItem.name: Organic Seeds
hasMenuItem.description: A blend of organic seeds, typically includes a mix of flax, sesame, sunflower, and pumpkin seeds, lightly toasted to enhance their natural flavors.

review.reviewBody: Really good. The broccoli was a little raw

Excellent service and food.
I've tried cauli - sutra and Yogi's paradise and both are delicious.
I'll go for the salmon one next!
This place is my absolute favourite. The bowls and juices are so fresh and creative. And the best part is I feel amazing after
Love everything I've ordered from this new restaurant.. thank you for coming to White Rock
The bowls of this place are amazing this is my second door dash order.  Love these bowls.  The tuna one especially is my personal fav.   v
